title: 820-3115 battery not charging
message:
Hi guys i have an 820-3115 that had a corroded C7156 and little burn damage in the board, made a wire from pin 1 to pin 1 from C7562 and that seem to have done the job as I got fanspin. I dont get orange light though. I do have 3.42v, PPBUS is 12.31V with and without battery connected. I get fanspin with battery connected when I connect magsafe. When disconnect magsafe it can keep runing on battery alone. When only the battery is connected shorting C5710 will not start it up.

I replaced U7000 same result
Resistance between pin 17/18 U7000 = 3ohm
Between 27/28 = 20ohm
R5281 is 2K and R5280 is 2Kohm

When turned on I have 3.43v on both pins of R5281
On R5280 pin 1 = 3.43 and on pin two it switches between 3.43 and 0.2 not sure what it should be?SMC area looks pretty neat so havent done anything yet, like reflow.

What more to check?

title: 820-3115 battery not charging
message:
Resistance to ground on SCL/SDA lines?
R7000 is OK?

title: 820-3115 battery not charging
message: What 2inform said also inspect battery connector and the BIL for corrosion. Also could be crap under the SMC pulling it low not bad to run flux under to clear out crap
